Html:
Question regarding spell hit:

Rawr lists my hit as 14% but mouseover gives me 139. From my understanding 14% hit would equal a hit rating of about 176.

I spec 58/3/0 with 3 pts in AF, and I raid with Misery up. I need (17-3-3=11)% hit = 12.6*11 = 139 hit rating to reach the hit cap.

Is the % hit listed by Rawr incorrect while the hit rating is correct?

The 14% includes buffs and debuffs (such as hit food and misery), and the number on mouseover is the rating from gear only. Furthermore, in the mouseovers of individual spells, you can see the total hit value for that particular spell (ie including talents as well as buffs and debuffs).
Well that explains everything :) Thank you.
